summary.para: Provides the delegate folder an interface used to allocate and free item IDs.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method through which a delegate folder is given the interface required to allocate and free item IDs.

remarks.para: The IDs allocated by the delegate folder are in the form of structures. It is the delegate's job to pack its data into the pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) in the DELEGATEITEMID format.
